hero-safe.hero-title: Receive seismic alerts and real-time safety tips
hero-safe.hero-subtitle: Don't wait until it's too late! Sign up now to stay informed and prepared.

footer-safe.Proteggere-le-persone-con-allerte-sismic: Protecting people with timely seismic alerts and educational information
footer-safe.About-text: Advanced web application developed with React and Node.js

section-safe-info.section-info: is an advanced web application designed to provide you with instant earthquake alerts and advice on how to behave during these events. With SafeQuake Alert, you can enhance your safety and that of your family with timely notifications, educational information, and constant updates.

section-safe-services.services-subtitle-bot-telegram: Stay updated with notifications directly on Telegram.
section-safe-services.services-subtitle-1: Receive real-time push alerts, Telegram messages.
section-safe-services.services-subtitle-2: View real-time earthquakes on an interactive map.
section-safe-services.services-subtitle-3: Stay informed with the latest news and updates on seismology and safety.
section-safe-services.content-1: Safety during an earthquake is crucial and can make the difference between being prepared and acting in panic. With 'SafeQuake Alert', we want to ensure that every user receives relevant and personalized advice on how to behave during a seismic event. Thanks to the integration with targeted messages, our app provides tips based on the specific situation and globally recognized best practices.
section-safe-services.content-2: The 'Real-Time Chat' feature is a key component of the 'SafeQuake Alert' project, offering a direct communication channel between users and platform administrators. This feature was designed with the goal of providing immediate support, answering urgent questions, and enhancing the overall user experience during seismic emergency situations.

why-choose-safe.title: Why Choose SafeQuake Alert?
why-choose-safe.content-1: Protect yourself and your loved ones with timely and reliable alerts.
why-choose-safe.content-2: Learn how to behave during an earthquake and improve your awareness.
why-choose-safe.content-3: Receive notifications and advice across different communication channels to reach you wherever you are.
why-choose-safe.content-4: SafeQuake Alert offers a high level of personalization, ensuring targeted advice and alerts for each user.

loggedin.test-body: This is a simulated notification to test the system.

delete-comment.confirm-delete: Are you sure you want to delete this comment?

news.subtitle-news: Stay Updated on Seismic, Volcanic, and Geology Events in Italy

about.object: is an advanced web application developed with React and Node.js, designed to provide real-time earthquake alerts and offer advice on how to behave during such events. The system aims to improve public safety through timely notifications, educational information, and updated news.
about.paragrafo-2: The primary goal of SafeQuake Alert is to create a platform that alerts users in case of earthquakes, leveraging various communication channels such as push notifications and Telegram. Additionally, the system provides useful tips on how to react in emergencies, integrating OpenAI's artificial intelligence to ensure relevant and personalized responses, and offers a news section to keep users informed about relevant events and news.
about.registrazione-1: Secure registration system via email and phone number, with authentication protected by JWT tokens.
about.dashboard-1: Includes an interactive map to view real-time earthquakes, alert history, notification preferences configuration, and an updated news section.
about.sistema-1: Sending alerts via push notifications and Telegram using Firebase Cloud Messaging, Telegram Bot API.
about.integrazione-1: Generation of personalized messages on how to behave during an earthquake and quick responses via Telegram.
about.chat-1: Direct communication between users and administrators via chat implemented with Socket.io, with integrated moderation tools.
about.frontend-1: React, React Router, Bootstrap 5, Aos, Leaflet (map)
about.articoli-1: For educational information and useful advice
about.sicurezza-1: Timely and reliable alerts to improve preparation and response to seismic events.
about.educazione-1: Detailed tips and information on how to behave during earthquakes, increasing public awareness.
about.aggiornamenti-1: News and relevant developments to keep users always informed.
about.accessibilità-1: Notifications and advice available through various communication channels, reaching a broad audience.
about.progetto: The 'SafeQuake Alert' project stems from my passion for geology and the desire to use my technical skills to create an innovative solution that can improve public safety. My academic background in geology has provided me with a deep understanding of seismic processes and their impact on communities. This project represents an opportunity for me to combine my geological knowledge with web development skills, creating a system that not only alerts people in the event of an earthquake but also educates them on how to prepare and respond effectively.
about.registrati: Register using your email and phone number to start receiving notifications.
about.accedi: Access your dashboard to view real-time earthquakes on the interactive map.
about.configura: Set notification preferences to receive alerts via your preferred channel (Push, Telegram).
about.consulta: Check the news section to stay updated on seismology, geology, and safety.
about.utilizza: Use the real-time chat to communicate with administrators and receive immediate support.
about.innovativo: SafeQuake Alert is a comprehensive and innovative system that leverages the latest technologies to improve public safety in case of earthquakes. By integrating real-time data, multi-channel notifications, and artificial intelligence, this platform provides users with the tools needed to be better prepared and informed, thereby reducing the risk and impact of seismic events.

contact.info-10: For even faster support, we recommend joining our Telegram channel or contacting us through our dedicated account. This will allow you to receive instant updates on seismic events and interact with our support team.

lists-sismic.title: Real-time Seismic Events List
lists-sismic.info: The data and results published on these pages come from the National Institute of Geophysics and Volcanology and are distributed under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License.
lists-sismic.descrizione-sismic-1: Description of the Seismic Events Component
lists-sismic.descrizione-sismic-3: The "Seismic Events List" component is designed to provide a detailed list of recent and significant seismic events. Using real-time data, this component allows users to monitor and analyze seismic events occurring in Italy and surrounding areas.
lists-sismic.descrizione-sismic-5: Displays a table with a comprehensive overview of seismic events, including details such as date, time, magnitude, location, and depth. Data is updated every minute to ensure the accuracy of the information.
lists-sismic.descrizione-sismic-7: Users can filter seismic events by time range (last 7 days, 30 days, 90 days, 365 days) and by magnitude, allowing targeted viewing of events that meet specific criteria.
lists-sismic.descrizione-sismic-9: The component supports notification of new seismic events through an integrated notification system, alerting users when a significant event occurs or when there are relevant updates.

view-sismic.title: Seismic Event Details
view-sismic.button-chiudi: Button to close the seismic event information

delete-user.title: Delete User
delete-user.msg: Are you sure you want to delete this user

lists-users.error-response: The response is not an array

sismic-map.title: Last 20 Earthquake Events
sismic-map.msg-1: Real-Time Earthquake Events Map - 5000 seismic events are displayed.
sismic-map.msg-2: Total number of seismic events since the beginning of the year:
sismic-map.info-3: The 'Earthquake Events Map' component is an interactive tool designed to geographically display the location and intensity of recent seismic events. This map provides a visual representation of earthquake events, helping users better understand the spatial distribution and impact of earthquakes.
sismic-map.info-5: The map shows the location of each seismic event as a geolocated marker. Each marker is positioned exactly where the earthquake occurred, with sizes and colors reflecting the magnitude and depth of the event.
sismic-map.info-7: Users can zoom in and out of the map using zoom controls or the pinch-to-zoom gesture on mobile devices. It's also possible to pan the map to explore different geographic areas.

stronest-earth-quakes.title: Strongest Earthquake Events of the Year
stronest-earth-quakes.nessun-evento: No seismic events found for this year with magnitude between 2.8 and 6.

update-location.title: Location
update-location.error-cap: You must enter the ZIP code!
update-location.error-dati: No coordinates found for the provided address!
update-location.info-location: It is important to keep your location data updated to ensure effective and timely communication. By updating your location, we can check if earthquakes have occurred within a 100 km radius and notify you promptly. This will also allow us to provide useful tips on how to act in case of an emergency. Make sure to enter your current location for your safety and peace of mind.

update-notification.title: Notifications
update-notification.update-msg-1: By enabling push notifications, you can receive instant updates, such as news alerts, seismic event warnings, or messages with useful information.
update-notification.update-msg-2: By enabling Telegram notifications, you can receive instant updates, such as news alerts, seismic event warnings, or messages with useful information.
update-notification.error-telegram: You must enter your Telegram username!
update-notification.error-telegram-id: You must enter your Telegram ID!
update-notification.informazioni-1: To stay updated on seismic events in your area, we recommend enabling push and Telegram notifications. Push notifications will immediately alert you if an earthquake is detected. Additionally, by enabling Telegram notifications, you can receive updates and useful advice directly on your device. If you don't have a Telegram account yet, we recommend creating one to avoid missing any important information. Telegram is a free and easy-to-use app that will allow you to stay informed in real time about seismic events and safety measures to take.

update-profile.info-telefono: Enter the number with international prefix, e.g.: +391234567890 or +390123456789
update-profile.informazioni: Keeping your personal information up to date is essential for ensuring a better experience and communication. Please review and update the following profile details. After making the necessary changes, be sure to save to keep the information updated.
update-profile.error-nome: You must enter your first name!

update-profile.error-birthdate: You must enter your date of birth!
update-profile.error-telefono: The number must start with + and max 15 digits!
update-profile.error-lingua-favorita: You must select your favorite language!

update-profile.verify-data: You must be at least 18 years old!

sismic-nearby.avviso: You need to update your location data. Go to your profile!
sismic-nearby.info: The data and results published on these pages come from the National Institute of Geophysics and Volcanology and are distributed under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License.
sismic-nearby.info-descrizione-2: is designed to provide users with detailed information about seismic events that have occurred near their location. It is an interactive component that displays data related to the latest recorded seismic event and tracks all seismic events that have occurred within a 100 km radius from the user's location.
sismic-nearby.info-descrizione-5: The component displays details of the most recent earthquake, including date and time, magnitude, place, depth, and distance from the user's location. This information is presented in a table for easy reference.
sismic-nearby.info-descrizione-7: It provides a history of seismic events that have occurred within a 100 km radius from the user's current location. The events are listed in a table with details such as date, time, magnitude, place, geographic coordinates, and distance from the observation point.
sismic-nearby.info-descrizione-10: function, the component calculates the distance between the most recent recorded seismic event and the user's location, determining if the event was close enough to be relevant to the user.
sismic-nearby.info-descrizione-12: The user can select a seismic event from the table to view more details. Clicking on an event opens a modal that shows a map with the exact location of the event and provides additional information about the earthquake, such as magnitude, depth, and place.

info-utili.title: Useful Information
info-utili.tempo-origine-2: The origin time indicates the date and time when the rupture begins along the fault plane. Large earthquakes can have rupture processes lasting many tens of seconds.
info-utili.tempo-origine-3: On individual event pages, the origin time is also available in Italian time.
info-utili.tempo-origine-5: is UTC +1 hour during standard time and UTC +2 hours during daylight saving time.
info-utili.localizzazione-2: An earthquake begins to rupture the crust at the hypocenter, defined as the point at depth where the rock rupture starts.
info-utili.localizzazione-3: The epicenter coordinates are expressed in units of latitude and longitude.
info-utili.ipocentro-2: The depth of the hypocenter is the point in depth where the rock rupture or fault slip begins.
info-utili.magnitudo-2: Seismologists measure the size of an earthquake in units of magnitude.
info-utili.magnitudo-3: Preliminary magnitude values are communicated to the Department of Civil Protection.
info-utili.magnitudo-4: Richter magnitude or local magnitude ML
info-utili.magnitudo-6: The magnitude of an earthquake is a logarithmic measure.

how-it-works.text-1: SafeQuake Alert: The Advanced Solution for Monitoring Seismic Events
how-it-works.text-5: SafeQuake collects seismic data from reliable and up-to-date sources, processing it to provide immediate information to registered users. Every time a significant seismic event is detected, the application will send you an instant alert, allowing you to act promptly.
how-it-works.text-7: For a complete view of alerts and details on seismic events, users must access the
how-it-works.text-9: , which is the heart of the monitoring system.
how-it-works.text-11: Desktop notifications with real-time alerts will be displayed
how-it-works.text-12: only if the application is open on the dashboard page
how-it-works.text-15: . This feature ensures an optimized display of crucial information directly on your desktop, without the need to reload or manually check.
how-it-works.text-17: In addition to the dashboard, SafeQuake offers a notification system through the
how-it-works.text-19: bot, so you can receive alerts wherever you are, without having to open the web application.
how-it-works.text-20: To enable this feature, you need to register your
how-it-works.text-24: section of your user profile. Once the bot is configured, you will receive messages directly on Telegram every time a relevant seismic event occurs, allowing you to stay updated, even away from your desktop.
how-it-works.text-27: The app has been designed with a simple and accessible interface, offering smooth navigation through the control panel and various sections.
how-it-works.text-29: Every seismic event is reported immediately thanks to our cutting-edge detection system.
how-it-works.text-31: You can decide from which geographical areas to receive notifications, so you can monitor only the areas that interest you.
how-it-works.text-34: The Telegram bot integration allows you to receive instant alerts on your smartphone, without having to access the web page.
how-it-works.text-36: You can consult the history of seismic events at any time to keep track of all past tremors.
how-it-works.text-38: Log in to your user profile within the web app.
how-it-works.text-45: You will now automatically receive notifications via Telegram when a new seismic event is detected.
